ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess
ygData.msgSnippet: remember that tidbit of info about Lord Grimlot giving the wakazishi quest? that is what the lute used to be for, yet Lord Grimlot no longer gives the quest
ygData.messageBody:
remember that tidbit of info about Lord Grimlot giving the wakazishi quest?
that is what the lute used to be for, yet Lord Grimlot no longer gives the
quest (no i won't spoil it). so yes it was a quest item. i do not know
this for sure but was told so, and its an educated guess.

currently the lute has no effects like the mistmoore drum. either it will
remain useless or they will make it part of a quest or give it an effect.
so basically hold on to it and use it instead of a normal lute.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 16 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> From: Kirk Baptista <dopey@...>
>
> Yeah, likely it will be a quest item, and when you finish it,
> you will get
> 16 copper and a rusty short sword. Oh, and faction, of course. ;)
>
> Aranlas Starchaser,
> Bard of Kelethin
> >
